metadata.Title: CVE-2022-31783 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Liblouis 3.21.0 has an out-of-bounds write in compileRule in compileTranslationTable.c, as demonstrated by lou_trace.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-31783` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

liblouis-bin - 3.20.0-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis-data - 3.20.0-2ubuntu0.1
liblouis20 - 3.20.0-2ubuntu0.1
python3-louis - 3.20.0-2ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: liblouis package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.20.0-2ubuntu0.1').
